rules_text:
Cavern Mapper can't block.
[i]Landfall[/i] – Whenever a land you control enters, teach Cavern Mapper trample. [i](Put a trample counter on it. If it already has trample, put a +1/+1 counter on it instead.)[/i]
Whenever Cavern Mapper attacks, you may sacrifice a land. If you do, draw a card.
